title: Cat and Dog Heaven! Amazing Pet-Friendly Community! 2 Bed / 2 Bath
neighborhood: Arvada - Olde Town Arvada / Westminster  / Wheat Ridge
posting_body: In an effort to decrease the spread of COVID-19 we ask that you wear a mask while visiting the premises.
➢ Vaulted Ceilings and Sky Lights In Select Homes
Tucked away in the heart of Arvada, Foothills Park offers renovated studio, one and two bedroom apartment homes that define luxury.
Foothills Park boasts beautiful mature landscaping, open court yards, a sparkling pool and bbq pits!
Our property is a short drive away from I-70, with easy access to Wheat Ridge, Golden, Westminster, Broomfield and Downtown Denver!
Each of our well-appointed homes feature wood burning fireplaces, private patios or balconies, in home washers and dryers and individual water heaters.
We also offer vaulted ceilings in select units!
Stop by for a tour today and see why Foothills Park is Arvada's favorite place to call home!
Foothills Park is proudly managed by Peak Living.
At Peak Living, our mission is to provide the highest quality property management services in the industry.
We achieve this through our greatest asset; our people.
Our on-site and regional management teams offer unsurpassed customer service and local expertise for those living at our properties and for our clients.
➢ Easy Access to Wheat Ridge, Golden, Westminster, Broomfield and Downtown Denver
➢ Plenty of Shopping, Entertainment and Dining Nearby
No Max weight, One time Fee Per Pet $300.00, Pet Rent Per Pet $35.00
Foothills Park is a pet friendly community.
Breed restrictions apply, please contact our office for details.
Near Wheat Ridge, Golden, Lakewood, The Highlands, Westminster, and Boulder.
